channel.title: Bad problems with server, need help quickly to do with portals!
channel.description: i have over 10 portals, and i want to keep them all, i want to make them into 5 portals so i had an idea, when i click a portal a thing comes up on the chat screen with 2 portals named, so its easier and less spacley is there a way for this??

item.title: Bad problems with server, need help quickly to do with portals!
item.dc:creator: @coal_truck coal truck
item.description:
@coal_truck wrote:

me? im the one asking for a code to do it, i havent got a screen shot, all i want is when u click a portal a box pops up (like when u rub a ring of dueling and asks u were u wanna go) and then u click one, this way i dont have to find places for 10 portals, only like 5 or 2 portals.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 05:41:27 PM[/size][hr]i g2g like in 10 mins =(

so i got to know now, or itll have to be in 6 or 7 hours… (going sleep)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 05:44:00 PM[/size][hr]a few mins left…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2007, 05:52:21 PM[/size][hr]omfg… g2g -.-
